system.description:
An enchantment which causes wood to temporarily expand, primarily across its grain. The caster may select an amount of expansion from 1% (small) to 10% (large). Touch is required. EML is modified by the Age of Wood:

Age of Wood EML Modifier

Living Wood 0

Green Wood -10

Seasoned Wood -20

The enchantment is most often used to seal or open doors, seal leaky hulls, etc. A small expansion jams a door solidly, and a large one can destroy either the door or its frame. When the wood returns to its normal size, it has usually been weakened.

 

Bonus Effects

 

CML50+Touch no longer required.

 

Range is CSI hexes.

 

Time: 25-CSI seconds

Range: Touch/CSI hexes at CML50+

Duration: CSI hours
